mapper.select: SELECT r1.* ,r2.reply_no sub_reply_no ,r2.writer sub_writer ,r2.content sub_content ,r2.board_no sub_board_no ,r2.group_no sub_group_no ,r2.parent_no sub_parent_no ,r2.depth_no sub_depth_no ,r2.seq_no sub_seq_no ,r2.reg_date sub_reg_date ,r2.upd_date sub_upd_date ,r2.sub_count sub_sub_count FROM reply r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM reply WHERE reply_no <> group_no ) r2 ON r1.group_no = r2.group_no ORDER BY r1.group_no ASC ,r1.seq_no ASC ,r1.depth_no ASC ,r1.reg_date DESC

SELECT r1.* ,r2.reply_no sub_reply_no ,r2.writer sub_writer ,r2.content sub_content ,r2.board_no sub_board_no ,r2.group_no sub_group_no ,r2.parent_no sub_parent_no ,r2.depth_no sub_depth_no ,r2.seq_no sub_seq_no ,r2.reg_date sub_reg_date ,r2.upd_date sub_upd_date ,r2.sub_count sub_sub_count FROM reply r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM reply WHERE reply_no <> group_no ) r2 ON r1.group_no = r2.group_no WHERE r1.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY r1.group_no ASC ,r1.seq_no ASC ,r1.depth_no ASC ,r1.reg_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( writer, content, board_no, group_no, parent_no, depth_no, seq_no ) VALUES ( #{writer}, #{content}, #{boardNo}, #{groupNo}, #{parentNo}, #{depthNo}, #{seqNo} )
